alert.note: Alert for Dauphin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 8:55PM EDT until June 26 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 855 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dehart Dam, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lykens, Elizabethville, Klingerstown, Dehart Dam, Wiconisco, Gratz, Berrysburg, Pillow and Enders. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
